Tucson thinks for a moment.  After all, he had three mechs that had to lear=
n a lesson in discipline.  And what better way to do that by assigning them=
 together as a team where they would learn to work with each other rather t=
han  against themselves.

" I know just the three to assign to that task. I=
 will debrief them as they get settled in."

Perpetually on the move and co=
nstantly busy. 

On Aug 25, 2011, at 12:08 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly20=
02@...> wrote:

> Windlord:
>  
> "We have to protect them... We do=
nt know if Dark Rodimus will atempt something against them"replied Windlord=

> Tucson nods.
> 
> " She was, but she was sent out of the room, due to som=
e emotional instability on my part.  Leo Prime thought it was best not to e=
ndanger anyone and he was correct in his judgement.  I will not lie, I have=
 a weakness and it's my temper compounded by the temperament of my beast fo=
rm.  I sense there were issues on the old dragon's part that never were res=
olved.  And now those issues are mine.  But I will do my best to control my=
 temper.  Now as far as assistance goes, yes I would be honored if you woul=
d help in the search for our missing comrades.  Which ever task you want, f=
eel free to take it on.  And I welcome everyone's input on this too. "
> 
>=
 Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

oming

gies."

> > > > location.

 everything to do with numbers. The geographic
> > > > coordinates, they le=
ad to areas of latitude and longitude. Now, to find
> > > > Primal, he must=
 have informed someone as to where he was going. We chart
> > > > the dista=
nce between here and the intended destination, and map out various
> > > > =
routes leading to that location. You will come up with several different
> =

e he left
> > > > here, and the time it takes to reach the final destinatio=
n. Then, determine
> > > > the time of his last transmission and that will =
indicate how far he got and
> > > > where he could possibly be now. I know =
it sounds complicated, but it worked
> > > > on Cybertron, so let's see if =
that will work here."

mpted to locate the information. "The

ey would learn to work with each other rather than  against themselves=

<div>" She was, but she was sent out of the room, due to some e=

east form.  I sense there were issues on the old dragon's part that ne=
ver were resolved.  And now those issues are mine.  But I will do=

ould be honored if you would help in the search for our missing comrades. &=
